Audio.Locality: left bank of Rio Uraricuera, just east of BR-174, Roraima
Audio.Author: Jon King
Audio.Comments: Distance to mic. 20m. Natural call at sunset, seen briefly in flight near end of cut. Had been calling about halfway up 10m-high tree in dry seasonally flooded low, dense, thorny gallery forest. Some vehicle and wind noise.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
